Class DialogUtil

Utility class to display a notification dialog.

Method Detail

show

public static void show(String title,
                        Object message,
                        MessageType messageType)
Displays a dialog, for the given type.

Parameters:
title - The title of the dialog. May be null.
message - The dialog message.
messageType - The type of the message. If null, the message type will be PLAIN .
See Also:
"org.openide.NotifyDescriptor.Message"
